title: omg rito increase the rp we get

embed.description: WIP POST: Patch out; PBE down. Heavy WIP ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.

body:
